item.title: Mentoring Junior Students
item.description:
I ðŸ˜¹ am always passionate about talking / mentoring / working with junior self-motivated students. I’m a hands-on senior postdoc: I’d like to give very concrete suggestions and have frequent (can be short) 1-1 meetings with junior student. I also prefer writing detailed documents so that team members can agree on the technical details more quickly.

Here is a list of my current research interests:

  • Drug Discovery: protein sequence modeling, antibiotics discovery, drug-target interaction
  • Reinforcement Learning: meta RL, goal-conditioned, hierarchical RL, sample-efficient RL, navigation, emergent communication
  • Language Processing: text generation

Drop me an email if you are interested to have a chat.
